changes.change: Update FLEX version (November 8 2019 commit) which has a few crash fixes and adds file brower for iOS 13
Remove the status color fix for homescreen as it was completely beign removed when you leave explorer
Update FLEX version (September 15 2019 commit) which unreverts the crash issue and fixes the fields defaulting to 0 (or nil) and method calls no-oping
Update FLEX version (September 14 2019 commit) which includes more UI refactoring and cleanup
Reverts the crash for viewing NSNumber (August 27 2019 commit)
Fix sleep prevention on lockscreen when exploring FLEX views for iOS 11+
Update FLEX version (August 27 2019 commit) which includes fix for crash when viewing NSNumber
Update FLEX version (August 20 2019 commit) which includes a lot of UI refactoring, UI bug fixes, and adds ability to pass addresses as params for id args
Update FLEX version (July 10 2019 commit) which includes a bunch of UI refactoring
Update FLEX version (May 31 2019 commit) which should have the fix for frame/bounds causing crash on iOS 12 devices
Fix status bar color when explorer is opened on homescreen
Add done button when explorer classes so you don't have to go all the way back to dismiss the explorer
